#发送私聊信息
from function import send_private_msg
a = send_private_msg("3270039695","hello")
print(a)


        if post_type == "message":
            message_type = main_into["message_type"]
            if message_type == "group":
                group_id = main_into["group_id"]

            else:
                pass
        else:
            pass
